member.name: M:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Controllers.SoftAMLController.Dispose(System.Boolean)

members.member:
This view model class has been referred from example created by Marien Monnier at Soft.it. All credits to Marien for this class
A full result, as understood by jQuery DataTables.
The data type of each row.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtResult`1.Draw
member.summary: The draw counter that this object is a response to - from the draw parameter sent as part of the data request. Note that it is strongly recommended for security reasons that you cast this parameter to an integer, rather than simply echoing back to the client what it sent in the draw parameter, in order to prevent Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtResult`1.RecordsTotal
member.summary: Total records, before filtering (i.e. the total number of records in the database)

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtResult`1.RecordsFiltered
member.summary: Total records, after filtering (i.e. the total number of records after filtering has been applied - not just the number of records being returned for this page of data).

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtResult`1.Data
member.summary: The data to be displayed in the table. This is an array of data source objects, one for each row, which will be used by DataTables. Note that this parameter's name can be changed using the ajaxDT option's dataSrc property.

member.name: T:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtRow
member.summary: The additional columns that you can send to jQuery DataTables for automatic processing.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtRow.DtRowId
member.summary: Set the ID property of the dt-tag tr node to this value

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtRow.DtRowClass
member.summary: Add this class to the dt-tag tr node

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtRow.DtRowData
member.summary: Add this data property to the row's dt-tag tr node allowing abstract data to be added to the node, using the HTML5 data-* attributes. This uses the jQuery data() method to set the data, which can also then be used for later retrieval (for example on a click event).

member.name: T:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters
member.summary: The parameters sent by jQuery DataTables in AJAX queries.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.Draw
member.summary: Draw counter. This is used by DataTables to ensure that the Ajax returns from server-side processing requests are drawn in sequence by DataTables (Ajax requests are asynchronous and thus can return out of sequence). This is used as part of the draw return parameter (see below).

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.Columns
member.summary: An array defining all columns in the table.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.Order
member.summary: An array defining how many columns are being ordering upon - i.e. if the array length is 1, then a single column sort is being performed, otherwise a multi-column sort is being performed.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.Start
member.summary: Paging first record indicator. This is the start point in the current data set (0 index based - i.e. 0 is the first record).

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.Length
member.summary: Number of records that the table can display in the current draw. It is expected that the number of records returned will be equal to this number, unless the server has fewer records to return. Note that this can be -1 to indicate that all records should be returned (although that negates any benefits of server-side processing!)

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.Search
member.summary: Global search value. To be applied to all columns which have searchable as true.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.SortOrder
member.summary: Custom column that is used to further sort on the first Order column.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtParameters.AdditionalValues
member.summary: For Posting Additional Parameters to Server

member.name: T:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtColumn
member.summary: A jQuery DataTables column.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtColumn.Data
member.summary: Column's data source, as defined by columns.data.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtColumn.Name
member.summary: Column's name, as defined by columns.name.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtColumn.Searchable
member.summary: Flag to indicate if this column is searchable (true) or not (false). This is controlled by columns.searchable.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtColumn.Orderable
member.summary: Flag to indicate if this column is orderable (true) or not (false). This is controlled by columns.orderable.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtColumn.Search
member.summary: Specific search value.

member.name: T:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtOrder
member.summary: An order, as sent by jQuery DataTables when doing AJAX queries.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtOrder.Column
member.summary: Column to which ordering should be applied. This is an index reference to the columns array of information that is also submitted to the server.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtOrder.Dir
member.summary: Ordering direction for this column. It will be dt-string asc or dt-string desc to indicate ascending ordering or descending ordering, respectively.

member.name: T:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtOrderDir
member.summary: Sort orders of jQuery DataTables.

member.name: T:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtSearch
member.summary: A search, as sent by jQuery DataTables when doing AJAX queries.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtSearch.Value
member.summary: Global search value. To be applied to all columns which have searchable as true.

member.name: P:SoftAML_UpperLinkAPI.Models.AuxillaryModels.DtSearch.Regex
member.summary: true if the global filter should be treated as a regular expression for advanced searching, false otherwise. Note that normally server-side processing scripts will not perform regular expression searching for performance reasons on large data sets, but it is technically possible and at the discretion of your script.
